titleStmt.title: Cambridge, Emmanuel College, MS I.4.21, vol. 1.

history.provenance: Provenance: Inscr. ‘Iste liber constat Thome Elton’, 15th c., at end; ‘Iste liber constat Joh. Tindall’, f. 15th/16th c., at end; inscr. ‘Henricus Gocheus’, Henry Goche of Trinity College Cambridge, 17th c.; f. 1; gift of Thomas Leigh, c. 1667.

listBibl.bibl: Bibliography: M. R. James, The Western Manuscripts in Emmanuel College, Cambridge (Cambridge, 1904), no. 99, pp. 86–8.

body.p:
Cambridge, Emmanuel College
MS I.4.21, vol. 1. Magna carta with statutes. 111 ff. 146 x 102 mm.
Provenance: Inscr. ‘Iste liber constat Thome Elton’, 15th c., at end; ‘Iste liber constat Joh. Tindall’, f. 15th/16th c., at end; inscr. ‘Henricus Gocheus’, Henry Goche of Trinity College Cambridge, 17th c.; f. 1; gift of Thomas Leigh, c. 1667.
Bibliography: M. R. James, The Western Manuscripts in Emmanuel College, Cambridge (Cambridge, 1904), no. 99, pp. 86–8.
